nodes.text: The Warlord's Deep was the name given to one of the sections of the Tomb, an ancient prison built on the planet Belsavis by the Rakata. A tropical rift like the other sections of the Tomb, the Deep was linked to the nearby Ancient Stasis Zone by the Icewall Ravine. The signal monitoring center and a transporter designated the deep launchpoint transfer were located in the Deep, as was a number of Rakatan vaults.
The Warlord's Deep appears a subregion of the Tomb on Belsavis in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic.
